title: Strengthening Practical Curriculum Development Competencies: Consumer New Product Learning via Customized Interactive E-Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can master over 80% of product functions through customized interactive modules based on new product usage scenarios
Learners can derive at least three problem-solving strategies through interaction with peer learners via online discussions and feedback activities
Learners can demonstrate and explain effective methods for utilizing new products in real-world environments through project-based assessments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
